The resulting path is then passed to `currentFS.Open(...)`. When the filesystem is...

items.headline: Stored XSS in Rack::Directory via javascript: filenames rendered into anchor href

Clicking this entry executes arbitrary JavaScript in the context of the hosting application. This results in a client-side XSS condition in directory listings generated by...
